body.header: IELTS Writing Task 1You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. You should write at least 150 words.

p.b: You are planning a holiday in Australia. You have been given the name and address of a hotel in the centre of Sydney and would like further information.
Write a letter to the hotel. Ask for the availability of the rooms and the hotel's facilities. Find out if the hotel arranges day trips and ask them to send you a brochure.

section.p: You do NOT need to write your own address.
